title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs as a single Go binary with a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browser).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, embed.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli (go-llama-cli)
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in Docker/Podman.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that uses Ollama to answer questions in threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-npm (ollama-node)
summary: Official npm package providing Node.js and browser bindings for Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python integration with Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Example repo showing RAG chatbot using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with async/tokio support.
